question: Who has been appointed as the new Chief Statistician of India (CSI)?
explanation:
The Government of India has recently appointed Dr G P Samanta as the new Chief Statistician of India (CSI).
Presently, he is the advisor in the RBI's Department of Statistics and Information Management. Samanta would be replacing Dr Kshatrapati Shivaji who has been holding the additional charge of CSI since September 2020.
